description:
Lo0king for a Serious Life long Commitment, unto & under the will of My Maker & Messiah, The God of Isra'el.

I live an off grid / Self sustaining / glamping / farming Lifestyle. =]

HATE CATS, Drugs & Free Sex. 

Love living under My Saviours Instruction & Example Daily.

Thrive on Challenges, Change & Growth.

I daily Heal and Love to Heal Others, cannot stand those in Denial and I too am a Sapiosexual in Many Ways. 

Amen.

Shabbat is a must. Kosher too.
